item.title: Looking Back at AI Field Day 4
item.description: AI is dominating most tech and even non-tech conversations nowadays with no signs of it slowing down anytime soon. This was certainly evident based on the presentations at the AI Field Day 4 event. The event provided an opportunity for various software and hardware vendors to present their AI related solutions to a group of delegates.
